places_with_reviews.name: Lemon Tree Hotel, Aligarh
address: Plot No:B/11, Marris Rd, opp. Pragati Vihar Colony, Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh 202001, India

reviews.text:
The staff is super helpful in this facility particularly Ashish at the front desk, Nitin and Ankit at the restaurant. These amazing individuals are determined to make this facility stand out. I have traveled the world and have stayed in the finest places and surely this facility is among the best.
Truly beyond expectations!! A five star experience.

Lemon Tree Hotels are known for their vibrant decor, refreshing ambiance, and warm hospitality. The hotel chain has a strong presence across India, offering comfortable stays at reasonable prices.

The rooms are clean, well-maintained, and come with all the necessary amenities. The staff is courteous and always ready to assist, adding a personal touch to the stay. The hotel's dining options are also impressive, with a variety of delicious dishes to choose from.

One of the highlights of Lemon Tree Hotels is their focus on sustainability. They have implemented various eco-friendly practices, such as water and energy conservation measures, which is commendable.

Overall, Lemon Tree Hotels offer a pleasant and memorable stay experience, making them a great choice for both business and leisure travelers.

Good location on Marris Road. Well designed and located. The lobby and restaurant are quite decent. Rooms are also state of the art, not very luxurious yet good enough for a business hotel. Staff is warm and courteous. Food is also good.

Great ambiance, good food, comfortable stay.
Refreshes you after a tiring day.
This is the essence of Lemon Tree Hotel, Aligarh
Enjoyed it and will always recommend it.

Its located centrally, has good staff, Shavez at the reception and Chef Moin are exceptional. Rooms are a little smaller in size and so are the bathrooms. Other than that the staff was responsive and service was good.They don't have a vallet parking, the owners should look into it.
The cleanliness and food was good.

preprocessed_reviews: staff super helpful facility particularly ashish front desk nitin ankit restaurant amazing individuals determined make facility stand traveled world stayed finest places surely facility among best truly beyond expectations five star experience

great ambiance good food comfortable stay refreshes tiring day essence lemon tree hotel aligarh enjoyed always recommend

places_with_reviews.name: Clarks Inn Aligarh
address: Mandir Ka Nagla, Agra Rd, near Flyover, Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh 202001, India

reviews.text: This is a great place to stay at aligarh. 100 metre Near the highway and easily approachable. I travelled here as a business solo traveler. Ambience is good. Rooms are super clean. Staff behaviour is also good. What I personally liked about the property is the calm and quiet environment. Restaurant is also great and the food is super delicious. 5 out of 5 points for the property.

I'm thrilled to express my satisfaction with Hotel Clarks Inn Aligarh following my brother's engagement on October 24, 2023. The starters were delightful, the ambiance was ideal, and the main course surpassed our expectations. The attentive service contributed to an overall exceptional experience, creating lasting memories for our family. I highly recommend this venue for special celebrations!

Good hotel with very supportive staff.
I went for one of my relatives engagement function.
Staff was very proactive and bringing the items before it finishes.
Food quality is very good.
Part hall ambienece is good.
Overall its a good place for family functions

This hotel resides just on the corner on aligarh highway
1. ROOMS PRICES
• We booked 2 rooms for our guests priced at 3500₹ per room
2.  FOOD
• In hotel restaurant was OUTSTANDING 5/5
3. SERVICE
• Service was very quick and amazing and specially High quality staff in restaurant which helps you with children handling and gives you comfort

This hotel is highly recommended

"ZERO" ratings

Worst ever services, unprofessional management, unhygienic mattress.. never ever recommended even for free. This hotel is more like a 500/- OYO where no lift is working, walls are unpainted, no electricity in rooms, electricity boards are broken, no water supply in rooms. Here I'm attaching some photos for your reference. If you need more proofs, contact me.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Orchid Blu
address: Hotel Orchid Blu, Ramghat Rd, Kishanpur, Janakpuri, Hem Chand Compound, Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh 202001, India

reviews.text: Superb location. Excellent service rendered by every member of staffs that served us especially Mr Aslam khan at the reception .Very clean ambience from the hotel entry to the room and the toilet . Good heater service and hot water in this cold winter trip of ours. Definitely worth the price and this is our  hotel whenever we stay in Aligarh. Would recommend others to book this hotel too.
One of the best hotel for small function like engagement, party etc. Food and Hall was excellent. Pradeep AGM behaviour was very cooperative. Rooms services was good. Parking was too spacious.

We are really impressed with the best ambience, food and service we have experienced in Aligarh. The Orchid staff were really helpful and cooperative.

Please visit as soon as possible.
Loved the service and food here. Staff is very patient and well behaved. Quality of food is very good.

Enjoyed the food.
The services were really good
Everyone enjoyed alot.
We celebrated my in the "Lotus hall", it is very spacious.
The staff is really polite and sweet.
Enjoyed the evening :)

loved service food staff patient well behaved quality food good

places_with_reviews.name: Fortune Park, Aligarh - Member ITC's hotel group
address: fortune park, 3747/1, GT Rd, near Maharaja Agrasen Sewa Sadan, Budh Vihar North, Bannadevi, Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh 202001, India

reviews.text: It had also automatic water tap. They sensed our hands and automatically opened. We put our hands in the water dryer and it gave us cool air. The flush of toilet had two one big and one small. I clicked the big one and holded it the water ran throught the toilet until I pressed the button. The walls of the living room had water sprinklers. Outside there was also a amazing fountain.

I had a worst experience with the staff….worst hospitality… staff don’t even know how to  talk with the visitors…not even manager specially Mr. Kuldeep has any gesture to show … this hotel staff should be change immediately first of all main manager. He did misbehave with our little kids to enjoying with Christmas decoration.  He told us that your kids can’t touch it and plz apne bacche sambhaliye … ये कैसे बच्चे हैं …. I hope the action will be taken soon otherwise I will have to take any action

Kaushal Parashar and team is doing perfect job.
His followup brought me to hotel.
All things perfect .
Best for Aligarh.

I had great experience with fortune park in..My sister's wedding event was organised here and Groom and his family were overwhelmed with their hospitality.
Jalsa banquet hall was too spacious tidy clean and well managed during entire event.
decor team did fabulous work.
Aatish ji and sneha were at their best .... both of them made my entire family relaxed while welcoming groom and executing the shadi event effortlessly..... Very smooth.

Chef Himmat ji and his staff were also good. food was good

ambience was good.
my relatives who all were outstation guest, they were mesmerized to see this property, that too in aligarh.... I mean my entire family is happy..

Rooms were good and spacious but washroom having a peculiar smell and the lock was not working I stayed in room no303on 26th Jan.The food was amazing.It was fresh, attractive and delicious.some of the staff were very attentive and caring towards my kids.As there was some marriage function so lots of noise on 27th Jan.Overall it was a good experience would love to come again.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Abha Regency
address: Ramghat Rd, near Sumangalam Hospital, New Vishnupuri, Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh 202001, India

reviews.text: Useless hotel and the staff. They keep giving you excuses for the wifi usage. Bad Room Service. Geyser doesn't work as well. Highly disappointed!

Good hotel
Above average
Plan to stay for your short visits
Not upto the Mark ..Have to Improve a lot on the Cleanliness Front ..Washrooms should be large .

This review is about the restaurant and not the property (which they seem to have nice and well maintained). The food I didn't find delicious but average. They don't suggest or advise you regarding food (once I ordered two Sabzi, the waiter did't tell me that the greavy of both was same, so the taste was also same. Both were sweet in taste also. In other restaurants I find waiters telling you these things so that you don't get surprised when your order arrives). Location and service is good. Resturant is well maintained, clean and pleasing. Facilities are good. Staff is nice.

Restaurant is a make shift to another floor as the main restaurant was hired for some other event. However the ambience and seating in makeshift location is not so comfortable but the rate/cost is as main restaurant. These are only money minded restaurant and not concern about quality and standard.

places_with_reviews.name: Palm Tree Hotel & Restaurant
address: 3/291, Marris Rd, Opposite Income Tax Office, Durga Baadi, Civil Lines, Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh 202001, India

reviews.text: Ambience was good. Breakfast offered was excellent. Staff was helpful in carrying the luggage. However, the bathroom had no proper drainage and room service also didn't pay much attention on the complaints.

This is a pick of Raj Kachori, which looks so bad in appearance, how bad it will be in eating ? and in fact, its taste was so bad that I could not even eat it, I liked Palm Tree Raj Kachori,  So I had ordered but maybe their staff has changed and I did not get the old taste, when I asked them to taste it, the staff there took the plate and put curd in it without asking me. They might have thought that adding curd would improve the taste but nothing like this happened in the taste. 😅😅😅
And the staff is such that they don't even have the manners to talk to the customers.
Perhaps due to less money, less educated staff has been hired. 🤔

The hotel is good. I attended a family event, I feel a lack of support from the service staff. Amenities cleanliness are good. They need to work on the front and outer part of the building, no name and building seems under construction.
Food tastes really amazing and quantity is sufficient as per the price. Overall a good option for parties or get together.
One of good Aligarh hotels. Nice rooms for stay and one of best resturants inhouse including Karim's resturant.

preprocessed_reviews: ambience good breakfast offered excellent staff helpful carrying luggage however bathroom proper drainage room service also didnt pay much attention complaints

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Ruby
address: GT Rd, Opposite Old Bus stand, Gandhi Park, Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh 202001, India

reviews.text: Nice location, very spacious , Good parking , close to Railway station and Bus stand, but poorly maintained. The condition of the room was not good and maintained. Lots of mosquitos are welcome in the room. Discolored walls do not feel good. The bathroom door was without stoper causing a lot of inconvenience. The hotel owner must give a thought over it.

Room key and WiFi has to be activated every day - which is such a pain! Front desk is very irresponsive and doesn’t care about the guests! We booked a cab through the hotel and had a nightmare of an experience! Not recommended!
Excellent stay near and clean room ...and food quality is also very good..

Service has detoriated. I am staying in executive room. I asked for wifi details at around 09.45 PM. I was told that he will call back. I waited for 40 minutes. Nobody called . Ultimately I called them they gave me PW but not user ID. Thereafter phone got continuously engaged and I couldn't contact. This is the situation.

The worstest hotel in Aligarh city zero quality food serve 😡 I ordered spicy dal makhni and they serve sweet dal makhni zero quality, low quality Cook they have, I suggest you don't go, wasting of money  #rubyhotel

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel The Royal Residency
address: 5th KM, Delhi Road, GT Rd, Sangam Nagar, Sarsol, Sarsaul, Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh 202001, India

reviews.text:
The entire property was very beautiful(Royal Residency), especially the banquet hall of the hotel.The decoration was further enhancing her beauty far expectations.The rooms were quite spacious and neat and clean .staff was very helpful and professional.
The moments mentioned here will be memorable.
Thank you Royal Residency
We have celebrated our mom's birthday. They have made special arrangements. Amazing decoration, and good service. Thank you Rahil Sir for helping us in the same.

The nature of the people serving the food is very good. The taste of the food is very good. The interior of the banquet hall is very beautiful. The rooms are also worth seeing. The food is at normal rate and not very expensive. My experience was very good and I am very happy. If anyone asks me for a good hotel from now i will always be suggesting this.

Well maintained rooms with all facilities. Extremely comfortable and spacious. A bit outside the overcrowded city makes location very nice. Food is very tasty. This place is good value for money. The staff is very helpful.

"Hotel Royal Residency Aligarh provided an unforgettable experience. Upon arrival, their warm hospitality immediately stood out. The blend of elegant décor and modern amenities offered a luxurious retreat. The staff's impeccable service enhanced the stay, ensuring a comfortable experience throughout. Dining at their restaurant was a culinary delight, complemented by the hotel's convenient central location for city exploration. The cleanliness and attention to detail, from the plush bedding to the exquisite meals, surpassed expectations. I highly recommend Hotel Royal Residency Aligarh for an unparalleled stay characterized by outstanding staff, cleanliness, and overall excellence."

places_with_reviews.name: UP81 Suites
address: GT Rd, opposite Church, near Maruti Showroom, Near Suraksha Vihar, Tubewell Colony, Chauhapur, Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh 202001, India

reviews.text: I recently had my sons wedding at UP81 Suits, the service was outstanding. The staff was really supportive and helpful. The Food was extremely delicious, the Owner were really nice and all and all was a wonderful and memorable experience for everybody. 100% recommend to everybody.

This hotel is fraud and very unprofessional. They don’t have standard of service but they think of themselves some big 4 star hotel range. The location is so far from city with traffic worse situation. They don’t stick to what they commit. Very bad dont book and take their services . Very pricey

Worst service ever, I visited yesterday with my friends, as soon as we entered they gave the menu card and asked to order. We told them we were expecting some other friends as well.

Food was pathetic, initially we ordered tomato soup , sweetcorn soup ..
In sweetcorn soup, sweet corn were not properly boiled they were so hard that they can’t be chew by humans. I asked the manager to check the soup , she came and checked it, and asked me do you want replacement. I clearly said NO .
And this doesn’t end here now it’s time for tomato soup, tomato soup were stinking like hell, we also complained about the same, manager in well dressed blazer said this is the only way it is served, the soup is perfect.

This is my request to all the hotel management staff out there … replacement is not the option for the mistake you do .

Now it’s time for starters and their well known sizzler , all the starters were too oily that we had to left them as it is, it was our mistake that we had given the order at a single moment.
No Taste at all.
Now we talk about their well known sizzler,
Their chef forgot to add the Paneer pieces in the sizzler. Initially they serve the Sizzler on our table and later five minutes later one of the waiter came and gave us six pieces of Paneer in an another plate. This was hilarious seriously guys. This was hilarious.

Neither the taste nor the staff nothing was good. This was my first worst worst experience ever at any restaurant.

I would never recommend you guys to go at UP81 suites.
Stayed for around three days....for a wedding. Impeccable cleanliness, yummy food and polite and friendly staff. Property Owners were also very courteous...Loved the stay...
Very Nice Experience , Food Was Very Good And Delicious . Best Service . Must Visit And Try The Food . Best Of Luck To UP 81 Suites Owner And As Well As Staff For Future . Very Much Satisfied .
